General.Name: Morarjee Textiles Limited
General.Description: Morarjee Textiles Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of yarns and fabrics in India and internationally. It offers cotton shirting fabrics; printed fabrics, including satin, cambric, poplin, lawn, and silk; yarn dyed shirting, such as prima linea, ganges, and seasonal collection; and voiles and white fabrics. The company was founded in 1871 and is based in Mumbai, India. Morarjee Textiles Limited is a subsidiary of Ashok Piramal Group Textiles Trust.

1.Name: Mr. Harshvardhan Ashok Piramal B.Sc., MBA
1.Title: Exec. Vice Chairman
